titleInfo.title: A brief guide to the Golden Tanjur; und: Review of: The Samādhi of Direct Encounter with the Buddhas of the Present: An Annotated English Translation of the Tibetan Version of the Pratyutpanna-Buddha-Saṃmukhāvasthita-Sūtra with Several Appendices Relating to the History of the Text. Paul Harrison. Tokyo: The International Institute for Buddhist Studies, 1990.
